title: Contemporary Mangalsutra Necklace with Rose Gold Finish
materials: Base metal with Rose Gold finish
features: Delicate double-strand design featuring a rose gold-toned chain interspersed with traditional black beads (nalla pusalu). Accented with two stunning CZ diamond pendants, one floral and the other square, each framed by pave-set stones for maximum brilliance. Modern interpretation of a classic symbol.
description: A contemporary and elegant take on the traditional Mangalsutra. Offers the auspicious symbolism with a fashionable and lightweight design suitable for everyday wear. The rose gold finish provides a modern and romantic touch, while the sparkling CZ diamonds add a touch of luxury. Durable and tarnish-resistant base metal ensures lasting beauty.
